name: US Gold Corp.
description: US Gold Corp. is a publicly traded exploration company focused on advancing gold and silver projects in North America. Established in 2006 and headquartered in Elko, Nevada, the company aims to unlock the potential of its strategically located properties in prolific mining districts. US Gold Corp. primarily targets high-grade gold deposits and is dedicated to sustainable and responsible mining practices. Their flagship project, the Copper King Project located in Wyoming, showcases their commitment to discovering and developing valuable mineral resources. With a strong management team composed of experienced mining professionals, US Gold Corp. is well-positioned to capitalize on the growing demand for precious metals. The company also emphasizes its commitment to environmental stewardship and community engagement, ensuring that its operations benefit both shareholders and local populations. As a part of its growth strategy, US Gold Corp. actively seeks new exploration opportunities and evaluates potential acquisitions to enhance its portfolio. The company’s mission is to become a leading gold exploration entity while adhering to the highest standards of corporate governance and ethical practices.

seo.meta_title: US Gold Corp. | Leading Gold Exploration Company
seo.meta_description: Explore US Gold Corp., dedicated to advancing gold and silver projects in North America. Learn about our mining projects and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does US Gold Corp. do?
faq.answer: US Gold Corp. is focused on exploring and developing gold and silver mining projects in North America.

faq.question: Where is US Gold Corp. headquartered?
faq.answer: US Gold Corp. is headquartered in Elko, Nevada, USA.

faq.question: What are the major projects of US Gold Corp.?
faq.answer: The major projects include the Copper King Project, Chisna Project, and Challis Gold Project.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of US Gold Corp.?
faq.answer: Edward Karr is the CEO of US Gold Corp.

faq.question: When was US Gold Corp. founded?
faq.answer: US Gold Corp. was founded in 2006.
